titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BREAST CANCER INVASIVE SIZE LESS THAN 10mm TOTAL - Description

div.p: BREAST CANCER INVASIVE SIZE LESS THAN 10mm TOTAL is the number of invasive breast cancers detected less than 10mm, where the BREAST BIOPSY REFERRAL OUTCOME National Code is 'Positive; i.e. cancer detected - invasive size known'.
